bootcamp.practice.three

Interface UserRepositoryService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserRepositoryImp, UserRepositoryProxy, UserRespositoryWebServiceClient

    public interface UserRepositoryService
    A user service for CRUD operations. Lets you create, read, update and delete users from a repository.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deleteUser(int userId)
      Deletes a User from the repository.
      List<User> getAllUsers()
      Get all the users from the repository.
      User getUserById(int userId)
      Get a user by its unique id key.
      void saveUser(User user)
      Save a user on the repository.

    • Method Detail

      • saveUser

        void saveUser(User user)
        Save a user on the repository. If the user exists, its updated. If not, its added to the repo. Usernames must be unique.
        Parameters:
        user - to be saved.

      • getUserById

        User getUserById(int userId)
        Get a user by its unique id key.
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the wanted user.
        Returns:
        A User object.

      • getAllUsers

        List<User> getAllUsers()
        Get all the users from the repository.
        Returns:
        A list with the User objects.

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser(int userId)
        Deletes a User from the repository.
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user to be deleted.
        Returns:
        True if the User was deleted.
